column2: single_lang_viz <- ggplot(single_lang_df, aes(x = age, y = vocabulary_score, color = study_id)) +
scale_x_continuous(breaks=seq(16, 30, 2)) +  # Ticks from 16-30 months, every 2 months
labs(caption = "\nFigure 2. Single-language vocabulary trajectories. Each color represents a \nparticipant.") +
